tool_description: Tradingview API for technical analysis, providing access to various indicators, oscillators, and summaries for market analysis.

api_list.name: Get Symbols From Exchange
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of symbols available on a specified exchange.

required_parameters.name: exchange
required_parameters.description: The stock exchange from which to retrieve symbols.

api_list.name: Get Analysis From Symbol
api_list.description: Obtain technical analysis data for a specific symbol.

required_parameters.name: screener
required_parameters.description: The screener to use for analysis.

required_parameters.name: interval
required_parameters.description: The time interval for the analysis.

required_parameters.name: exchange
required_parameters.description: The exchange where the symbol is listed.

api_list.name: Get Exchanges From Screener
api_list.description: Fetch a list of exchanges available for a specified screener.

required_parameters.name: screener
required_parameters.description: The screener to retrieve exchanges from.

api_list.name: Get Screeners
api_list.description: Get a list of available screeners for market analysis.

api_list.name: Get Intervals
api_list.description: Retrieve valid time intervals for analysis.
